name: LocationReference
description: inventory-service reference to Location entity contract

requiredFields.name: id
requiredFields.description: Location unique identifier - always required when referencing a location

requiredFields.name: code
requiredFields.description: Location code - identity field used for display

usagePoints.purpose: Provides LocationId and LocationCode identity fields in inventory response

notes: inventory-service stores locationId as foreign key and resolves via Warehouse service API when DTOs need identity fields (code, aisle, bay, level)
